case.desc: A/A-1-1: same polygons [dim(2){A.A.Int = B.A.Int}, dim(1){A.A.Bdy.SP-EP = B.A.Bdy.SP-EP}]

A/A-2: different polygons [dim(2){A.A.Int = B.A.Ext}]

A/A-3-1-7: the boundary (at a vertex) of a polygon touching the boundary (at a vertex) of another polygon [dim(0){A.A.Bdy.V = B.A.Bdy.V}]
